column1: 24173,Runaways (2008) #10,10,17523,116,"When Runaway Molly Hayes responds to the X-Men's psychic invitation welcoming all mutants to a new home in San Francisco, she declares it ""Moll-ifest Destiny"" and heads to the Headlands to investigate! But when she finds herself back-to-back with Wolverine, cornered by a villain with a vendetta, she might find being an X-Man isn't just secret clubhouses and cool-looking costumes... Rated T  ...$3.99",
